mapper.select: select * from goodsclick where goods_idx=#{goods_idx} and mem_idx=#{mem_idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goodsclick (goods_idx , mem_idx , goods_name , cate_id , gender , age_group , click_timestamp , is_selling) VALUES ( #{goods_idx}, #{mem_idx}, #{goods_name}, #{cate_id}, #{gender}, #{age_group}, now(), 1)
